de.iabg.j3d.event
Class RenderableSceneListener

java.lang.Object
  de.iabg.j3d.event.RenderableSceneListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneListener, java.util.EventListener
public class RenderableSceneListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements SceneListener

This implementation of a SceneListener links one Renderable object with another. This is usually necessary when an object aggregates Renderable objects and needs to be notified when each scene is changed. The notification of the scene change is chained through each subsequent Renderable object until it reaches a Renderer, which finally renders the scene.

Version:
September 10, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
